SxmUiHelpFindingRadioComponent.TITLE: How do I find my Radio ID?
SxmUiHelpFindingRadioComponent.NEED_HELP_TEXT: Tune your radio dial to channel 0 and the radio ID should display.
SxmUiHelpFindingRadioComponent.NEED_HELP_TEXT-1: Tune your radio dial to channel 0 and the radio ID should display. If that did not work try accessing the menu function on your radio (Refer to your owner's manual for specific instructions).
SxmUiHelpFindingRadioComponent.NEED_HELP_TEXT-2: For some Sirius radios, you will need to press and hold down the SAT or ESN button, or access your radio's menu functions.
SxmUiHelpFindingRadioComponent.TEXT_LINK-1: Get more help for Sirius radios
SxmUiHelpFindingRadioComponent.TEXT_LINK-2: Get help for Marine and Aviation devices

SxmUiHelpFindingRadioAndAccountComponent.TITLE: How do I find my Radio ID?
SxmUiHelpFindingRadioAndAccountComponent.NEED_HELP_TEXT-1: Tune your radio dial to channel 0 and the radio ID should display. If that did not work try accessing the menu function on your radio (Refer to your owner's manual for specific instructions).
SxmUiHelpFindingRadioAndAccountComponent.NEED_HELP_TEXT-2: For some Sirius radios, you will need to press and hold down the SAT or ESN button, or access your radio's menu functions.
SxmUiHelpFindingRadioAndAccountComponent.NEED_HELP_TEXT-3: If you still need help finding it, or your Account Number, please

SxmUiHelpFindingRadioAndAccountComponent.TEXT_LINK-2: Get help for Marine and Aviation devices

SxmUiDeviceHelpComponent.TITLE: Lookup your Marine or Aviation Device ID
SxmUiDeviceHelpComponent.MESSAGE: There are a few places you can look to find your Radio ID or ESN.
SxmUiDeviceHelpComponent.NOTE: Note: Radio IDs are 8 digits and letters, and ESN's are 12 digits.

UNORDERED_LIST.item-1: For most devices, access your Diagnostics or Settings menu, and then look for your ESN/Radio ID/Device ID to be listed.
UNORDERED_LIST.item-2: Additionally, on many devices you may also look on the bottom of the device, or the packaging that it came with for the Radio ID. In many cases, you may find it next to the serial number of the device.
UNORDERED_LIST.item-3: If your device also has audio capability, you may be able to tune to channel 0 and it will display your Radio ID.
UNORDERED_LIST.item-4: If you are still having trouble, you can call your manufacturer and ask them to provide you with your Radio ID.

SxmUiHelpFindingRadioAccordionComponent.RADIO_ID_HELP_LABEL: How do I find my Radio ID?
